attributes.action: work with all MPs to persuade the Speaker to resign immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Speaker has today again demonstrated his inability to understand the anger of the electorate or the frustration of members of the house re the expenses scandal, and now represents the biggest impediment to resolving the issues and restoring faith in our democratic system

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
